thread.title: Jose Mourinho outlines Man United’s summer transfer plans (video)
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho outlines Man United’s summer transfer plans (video)

author: Ben Green
title: Jose Mourinho outlines Man United’s summer transfer plans (video)
text:
Jose Mourinho outlines Man United’s summer transfer plans (video) By Ben Green   “The next push” 
Jose Mourinho has been very vocal in the build-up to Manchester United’s EFL Cup final against Southampton on Sunday at Wembley. 
With Manchester United on the verge of winning their first trophy of which could possibly be three in total, Jose Mourinho is comfortable in his role at Old Trafford. Jose Mourinho outlines Man United’s summer transfer plans 
As a result, he has talked about Manchester United ‘s summer transfer plans. 
Mourinho is clearly keen to do some business early on this summer, with the hope that “two of three” new players will be brought in to start working with Manchester United in July. 
The Special One also promises very little turnover from the current Manchester United squad and seems happy with the “stability” of the current performances. 
Two of three world class players and you can see Manchester United pushing Chelsea for the Premier League title next season… Winner Betting Odds
